messages.message: Hi team, I was doing accuracy testing and there was an issue with my ground truth dataset where there were no values. In this scenario, the Accuracy Report shows "No value found" for extraction but  this message is vague, the value should be a percent.

can you link your accuracy test so that we can investigate some more?

cc @ayesha.ali since you’re on-call

Thanks Serena, here you go:
https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com/hub/apps/df8180e5-e66c-4b5f-8a0f-43b5a3c16ed7/accuracy/11

There's a separate issue where I changed some ground truth values and the Validated accuracy is showing "No value found" and I don't see within the report that the accuracy is not 100%
hmm i’m not able to see your accuracy test - which org are you in?
I'm not sure, how can I tell which org I'm in? The workspace is Nationwide-onsite.
when you open your app and hover on the left side, what do you see under “Home”? in my screenshot, i’m currently in the Instabase-GTM org

ah i see that Nationwide-onsite is a workspace in the Instabase-GTM org

in that case, can you share your app so that the entire org can see the app? https://docs.instabase.com/apps/run-and-deploy#sharing-apps
Ok, I think I shared it.
great! i’m able to view your accuracy test now!

so in your linked accuracy test (https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com/hub/apps/df8180e5-e66c-4b5f-8a0f-43b5a3c16ed7/accuracy/11), the validated accuracy is actually 0% - i’ll fix the frontend to show 0% in this case

also, if you click the expand button, you’ll see that the table value in the accuracy test doesn’t match the table value in the ground truth set, so that’s why extraction raw accuracy and validated accuracy are 0% in this accuracy test

Ok, I was under the impression that if there's a table with let's say 10 fields and 7 fields match the ground truth, then the accuracy is 70%. But the way it's calculated, if any value in the table is wrong, the accuracy is 0 for the table.

yes, this is a known limitation of solution accuracy and has been reported by other customers as well

you can follow https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3254 for more updates
